"Ah, <%me>! Welcome back.": "Fufu, I've been feeling a lot better lately. Somehow, my body feels a lot lighter."
"And it seems my headaches have healed. I feel like I can do anything now."
"But last time I felt better and got carried away, I got yelled at by Philia."
"It's because people say that, and then fall over the next second, she said."
